document.full_text: libyan rebels beat off a new assault by muammar gaddafi's forces on the besieged western city of misrata on saturday, losing eight of their fighters in fierce street battles, the insurgents said.
document.title: libya rebels repel attack on misrata, gaddafi appears
lines_and_colors: libyan rebels beat off a new assault by muammar gaddafi's forces on the besieged western city of misrata on saturday, losing eight of their fighters in fierce street battles, the insurgents said.
